Apply to attend Paris in the 2020-2021 School Year. Learn more about the Open Enrollment process and schedule a tour today!
Paris School is a proud recipient of the 2011 national Blue Ribbon Schools Award for Educational Excellence!

h3.strong: A PROJECT LEAD THE WAY DISTINGUISHED SCHOOL

div.p: Paris School is a proud recipient of the 2017-2018 Project Lead the Way (PLTW) Distinguished School award.
